name: Chakana, Gold of the Gods
description:
It is a platform / metroidvania game inspired by Andean Mythology, with a focus on exploration, combat and discovery. Each level presents new challenges, enemies and secrets to unravel. Collect valuable items to improve your skills and unlock new areas as you progress on your adventure.



Immerse yourself in the world of Chakana, a world in destruction and experience the myths and legends of Andean Mythology. From mysterious temples to the vast jungles of the Amazon, each scene is full of details and references that will take you on a fascinating journey.



In the game you control Hoyustus, the jaguar warrior, in his goal to free his people from the oppression of a usurping god in the magical world of Chakana. Discover his unique abilities, such as his deadly spear and his condor wings that allow him to explore inaccessible areas. He learns new techniques and unlocks special powers as you progress through the different jungle settings, temples and ancient ruins.
